privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
1. Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, complete a form, or communicate with us. This may include:

  • First and last name
  • Email address
  • Payment information
  • Content you post or submit

2. Use of Information

We use the information we collect to:

  • Provide, maintain, and improve our services
  • Process your transactions
  • Send service-related communications
  • Personalize your educational experience
  • Understand and analyze how you use our services

3. Information Sharing

We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share information in the following circumstances:

  • With your consent
  • To comply with legal obligations
  • With service providers who help us operate
  • In connection with a merger or acquisition

4. Security

We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

5. Your Rights

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can contact us at any time to exercise these rights.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.content:
1. How can I start with EDULINE?

To get started, simply click any "Get Started" button and choose the plan that best suits your needs. You can register in less than 2 minutes.

2. Can I change plans at any time?

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your dashboard. Changes will be reflected in your next billing.

3. Do you offer a free trial?

Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial for all our plans. No credit card required to start the trial.

4. What payment methods do you accept?

We accept credit/debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers in some countries.

5. Can I cancel my subscription at any time?

Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard. Access will continue until the end of the current billing period.

6. Do you offer certificates upon course completion?

Yes, all our plans except Basic include completion certificates. Standard and Premium plans include official certificates with online verification.

7. How does the tutoring system work?

Our tutoring system connects students with area experts. You can schedule individual or group tutoring sessions according to your plan.

8. Is content available in multiple languages?

Yes, our content is available in Spanish, English, and Portuguese. You can change the language at any time from settings.

9. What devices are compatible?

Our platform is compatible with computers, tablets, and mobile phones. We also offer native apps for iOS and Android.

10. How do I contact technical support?

You can contact our support team through live chat, email, or phone. Response times vary according to your plan.
